description:
How to build a power station as scatter terrain for your sci-fi or modern tabletop game (Warhammer 40k, Warpath, etc.)

Supplies and Tools: https://www.amazon.com/shop/wylochscraftingvids
Chipboard: https://amzn.to/2EW2f2u

title: How to Make a Power Station for Warhammer 40k
